name: One Last Good Time
description:
This is our submission for the AdvXJam 2020. We chose to take the theme "A good time" on a different path than you might think about at first. 

We were 15 people working at this project during the two weeks, this enabled us to both spread out the workload but it also posed some challenges in collaboration and management while working from home.

As project manager I want to thank all who contributed to this project an extra time! I'm proud of our result and the good times this game jam created for us while working on it.

This project was made by students at Valla Game Education, class 2020. 

Alen Mujcin
